text: Sergio Daniel Ponce (born 9 January 1984) is an Argentine footballer who currently plays for Panegialios in the Football League as an Attacking midfielder or Winger. ==Career== Ponce began his professional playing career in 2004 with Chacarita Juniors in the Argentine 2nd division. Between 2008 and 2009 he was loaned to Greek side Panthrakikos F.C.. He returned to play for Chacarita Juniors in 2009 after the club's promotion to the Primera División. title: Sergio Daniel Ponce
